sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as integer,
		dateOfETL as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> source1

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false) ~> sink1

transformations.name: Aggregate1
transformations.script:
source1 aggregate(groupBy(year),
	ratingByYear = avg((Rating * 5) + {Rotton Tomato})) ~> Aggregate1

transformations.name: SurrogateKey1
transformations.script:
Aggregate1 keyGenerate(output(yearkey as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
